Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.vic

Interface VicDevice

  • public interface VicDevice
    An interface defining a device that verifies VIC codes.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isVerifyBlocked()

      Verify the code given by the caller to authenticate him

    • Method Detail

      • isVerifyBlocked

        boolean isVerifyBlocked()
                 throws IdpException
        Check if Verify Issuer Code is blocked (verifyIssuerCode(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.util.SecureString, com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.AuthInput)).

        This method is affected by the PUK Try Counter value.

        Returns:
        true if verify issuer code is blocked
        Throws:
        IdpException - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below.
        IdpStorageException - when there is a database operation failure
        DeviceFingerprintException - when the token's fingerprint checksum does not match.
        PasswordManagerException - when the TOKEN domain is not logged in (using one of the password managers)

      • isVerifyLastAttempt

        boolean isVerifyLastAttempt()
                     throws IdpException
        Check if Verify Issuer Code is the last attempt (verifyIssuerCode(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.util.SecureString, com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.AuthInput)).

        This method is affected by the PUK Try Counter value.

        Returns:
        true if only one attempt left for the Verify Issuer Code
        Throws:
        IdpException - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below.
        IdpStorageException - when there is a database operation failure
        DeviceFingerprintException - when the token's fingerprint checksum does not match.
        PasswordManagerException - when the TOKEN domain is not logged in (using one of the password managers)

      • verifyIssuerCode

        boolean verifyIssuerCode​(SecureString vic,
                         AuthInput authInput)
                  throws IdpException
        Verify the code given by the caller to authenticate him
        Parameters:
        vic - the code to be verified
        authInput - the authInput for authentication
        Returns:
        true if the code is correct. false otherwise
        Throws:
        IdpException - this is generic exception, you can directly catch this exception or catch each specific exception below. *
        VicException - when the ATC counter reaches its maximum value or when the Try Counter is blocked.
        IdpAuthException - When Authentication mode is not property activated.
        IllegalArgumentException - when the length of the VIC code is incorrect.
        IdpRuntimeException - when there is a cryptography operation failure.
        IdpStorageException - when there is a database operation failure
        DeviceFingerprintException - when the token's fingerprint checksum does not match.
        PasswordManagerException - when the TOKEN domain is not logged in (using one of the password managers)
